column9:
Thank you for your email.

I am currently overseas on Annual Leave and will not return to the office until Monday 24th May 2010.

For any contract related queries or issues that require urgent attention - please contact our Group General Manager Kirsty Ackland on 0431 630 473 or kirsty@countryclubs.com.au

For marketing related enquiries and any other matters - I will endeavor to address these at my earliest convenience upon returning to the office. Thank you for your patience.

With Kind Regards.

Bianca Sowik
Business Development & Marketing Manager
Country Club Hotels & Resorts
24 Dequetteville Tce. Kent Town SA 5067
Phone: 08 8362 5676
Mobile: 0408 831 172
Fax: 08 8363 2180
